description: Minimal test project to verify Linear and Slack integration

issues.title: Create Hello World File
issues.description: Create a file named `hello.txt` with specific content in the project root directory.
test_steps: Verify file content exactly matches: 'Hello World! This is a test from Your Claude Engineer.'
acceptance_criteria: hello.txt file created in project root
File content matches exactly as specified

issues.title: Send Slack Notification
issues.description: Send a message to the configured Slack channel with test completion notification.
test_steps: Send message: 'âœ… Test complete! Linear project created and hello.txt file generated successfully.'
Verify message appears in target Slack channel
Confirm message content is exact and formatted correctly
acceptance_criteria: Message successfully delivered to Slack channel
Message content matches exactly as specified
Message includes the checkmark emoji and proper punctuation

meta_issue.title: [META] Project Progress Tracker
meta_issue.description:
This issue tracks session progress for the Hello World Test project.
Total features: 2
Session 1: Project initialization and feature implementation

session_log.notes: Project structure initialized, Linear issues created, META issue created for tracking
